DOC.brief_summary: The investigator assess hypothesis whether RH-PAT index ( RHI ) marker endothelial dysfunction could predict occurrence ISR percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impaired Peripheral Endothelial Function In-stent Restenosis
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational study consecutive patient coronary artery disease ( CAD ) treat PCI Kumamoto University Hospital January 2010 September 2012 . Inclusion criterion consist patient symptomatic myocardial ischemia undergo stent implantation significant CAD .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion consist patient symptomatic myocardial ischemia undergo stent implantation significant CAD . Exclusion criterion balloon angioplasty without stent deployment , death hospitalization , patient comorbidities affect RHPAT result hemodialysis , advanced cancer , surgery breast cancer , dementia , collagen disease , perform RHPAT uncertain reason .
